info.author: Labreche Abdellatif
info.description:
==========================
Python JSON Config Manager
==========================

Usage
=====

config.json
-----------
.. code-block:: json

    {
        "database": {
            "password": "pass123", 
            "user": "root", 
            "name": "myDB", 
            "tables": {
                "comments": "nan", 
                "likes": "fuck it", 
                "users": "empty"
            }
            "keys": [
                "name",
                "id",
                "hash"
            ],
        }, 
        "server": {
            "port": 4444, 
            "host": "127.0.0.1"
        }
    }


test.py
-------

.. code-block:: python

    from Jconfig.config import Jconfig

    conf = Jconfig('./config.json', separator='.')

    PORT = conf.get('server.port')
    print(PORT) # 4444

    conf.set('database.tables.likes', 'hi bitch')

    conf.set('database.keys', ['md5', 'password', 'another'])

    conf.set('database.keys.2', 'hoho')
info.name: Jconfig
info.html_description:
========================== Python JSON Config Manager

Usage

config.json

.. code-block:: json

{
    "database": {
        "password": "pass123", 
        "user": "root", 
        "name": "myDB", 
        "tables": {
            "comments": "nan", 
            "likes": "fuck it", 
            "users": "empty"
        }
        "keys": [
            "name",
            "id",
            "hash"
        ],
    }, 
    "server": {
        "port": 4444, 
        "host": "127.0.0.1"
    }
}

test.py

.. code-block:: python

from Jconfig.config import Jconfig

conf = Jconfig('./config.json', separator='.')

PORT = conf.get('server.port')
print(PORT) # 4444

conf.set('database.tables.likes', 'hi bitch')

conf.set('database.keys', ['md5', 'password', 'another'])

conf.set('database.keys.2', 'hoho')
